author: Phil Vickery
method: For the salad, place the cooked lentils and the spinach into a serving bowl. For the dressing, place all the dressing ingredients into a bowl and mix well. To serve, pour the dressing over the lentils and spinach and stir well.
ingredients: 75g/2½oz Puy lentils, cooked according to packet instructions, drained and kept warm,  75g/2½oz spinach,  1 tbsp sesame oil,  2 tsp soy sauce,  pinch chilli flakes,  2 limes, juice only,  1 tbsp clear honey
